document.full_text: investigators of the weekend bus crash that killed 15 people on a new york highway said on monday they want to know what the driver was doing for the 72 hours leading up to the horrific accident.
document.title: bus driver in deadly new york crash faces scrutiny
lines_and_colors: investigators of the weekend bus crash that killed 15 people on a new york highway said on monday they want to know what the driver was doing for the 72 hours leading up to the horrific accident.
